title: Digital Resistance
we_demand_release: We demand the release of Pavel Durov from custody in France
already_supported: Elon Musk, Vitalik Buterin, and many others have already given their support in the last 2-3 days.
share_description: Share this link to this letter with your friends and followers on Telegram, X (ex. Twitter) and WhatsApp
share_stories_description: Publish stories to social networks to engage more people
add_badge_description: Add resistance badge to your avatar
